Except now there is no conflict between them, so any confrontation is going to be significantly less volatile and sparkly.

Wha..?

This is really cool! But..I feel like this is less of an event and more of a fleshing out of the lore of Targon through work on the champs related to it. It's not like bilge water or shurima where there was a story being published in addition to the new/updated champs. 

A little early to tell though; I am excited to see what happens!

> [{quoted}](name=Ayketh,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=MElNKT2m,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2016-03-14T18:44:49.038+0000)
> 
> A little early to tell though

Not really, they literally said themselves it's not gonna be an event like Bilgewater.
I really want Pantheon to have a nice Karthus VU update or maybe a Sion-level kind. Leona needs one too. q.q
Leona's visuals are fine. Only thing she needs is a slight model update so she has an actual breastplate rather than just a metal bra.

> [{quoted}](name=Yousosmart,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=MElNKT2m,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-03-14T18:06:53.460+0000)
>
> Leona's visuals are fine. Only thing she needs is a slight model update so she has an actual breastplate rather than just a metal bra.

pretty much

NO Theivianart picture will ever be fitting for anything.

Sorry, but it's true.
Who cares where it's hosted? Give the artist credit for their lovely work. That's all anyone's asking here.

I don't support the site, I don't support art theft and I don't support those who use the site, nor those who use it as a link.

I can't give credit anyway, the picture is a blank image as the site is blocked, but I can still see _where_ the image came from.
It does matter.  It matters that using the site to link artwork to these forums is supporting the site and what it stands for: letting their "paid" users get away with whatever they want, even at another artists expense.
Someone's taking it WAY too seriously. Did I try to claim credit for the art? No.
There is no upcoming event
This is easily the most bad ass piece of LoL art I have ever seen.
OMG. NEW WALLPAPER!
You for got the GEM ASPECT!
Talk to CGlas about that. I'm not the artist.
That....is....amazing.
